/imgs/BioPE.webp.title: Bio-PE Certification (97% Biobased)
/imgs/BioPE.webp.description: I'm Green Bio-Polyethylene certification from BETA accredited laboratory showing 97% biobased content. PJLA #59423 accreditation with ISO/IEC 17025:2005 compliance. Test date March 2015. Braskem's sustainable bio-based plastic alternative.
/imgs/BioPE.webp.alt: I'm Green Bio-PE certification showing 97% biobased content - BETA ISO/IEC 17025:2005 accredited laboratory test results for bio-polyethylene sustainable packaging material

/imgs/cert-brcgs.webp.title: BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging Materials Certificate
/imgs/cert-brcgs.webp.description: BRCGS (British Retail Consortium Global Standards) certification for Packaging Materials. Issue 6 August 2019, Achieved Grade B+, Unannounced Audit Programme (1 in 3). Certified by SGS with UKAS accreditation. Covers gravure printing, digital printing, lamination, curing, slitting of flexible plastic film including BOPP, TOPP, POPP, PET, KPET, KOPP, VMCPP, VMPET, VMOPP, AL, BOPA, RCPP, CPP, PE-films for primary food contact packaging.
/imgs/cert-brcgs.webp.alt: BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging Materials Grade B+ certificate - Issue 6 August 2019 SGS certified with UKAS accreditation for food-safe flexible packaging production

/imgs/cert-bcorp-pending.webp.title: Certified B Corporation Pending Status
/imgs/cert-bcorp-pending.webp.description: B Corporation certification pending status badge. Shows company commitment to social and environmental performance, accountability, and transparency. B Corp certification measures a company's entire social and environmental impact. Black and white official B Corp pending logo design.
/imgs/cert-bcorp-pending.webp.alt: Certified B Corporation Pending logo - sustainable business certification in progress demonstrating commitment to social and environmental responsibility

/imgs/cert-din-home-compostable.webp.title: DIN CERTCO Home Compostable Certificate
/imgs/cert-din-home-compostable.webp.description: TÜVRheinland DIN CERTCO certification for home compostable packaging. Certificate for products made of compostable materials for home and garden composting. Compost Packing Bag tested to NF T51-800:2015 standard. Registration No. 9P0246, valid until December 31, 2029. Features DIN Geprüft Home Compostable seal and DAkkS accreditation.
/imgs/cert-din-home-compostable.webp.alt: DIN CERTCO TÜVRheinland home compostable certification for packaging bags - NF T51-800:2015 standard compliant valid until 2029 with DIN Geprüft seal

/imgs/carbon-capture-facility.webp.title: Direct Air Capture Carbon Removal Facility
/imgs/carbon-capture-facility.webp.description: Industrial Direct Air Capture (DAC) facility with large cylindrical fan collectors removing CO2 from the atmosphere. Climeworks-style carbon capture technology set against a green Swiss landscape with rolling hills and forests. Represents cutting-edge carbon removal technology for combating climate change and achieving carbon neutrality.

/imgs/og-image.webp.description: Achieve Pack main hero visual showcasing 'Sustainable Packaging Solutions for a Greener Future'. /imgs/infographic-our-process.webp.title: Achieve Pack Manufacturing Process Timeline
/imgs/infographic-our-process.webp.description: Our Process infographic showing 5-step packaging production workflow with 30-45 day total timeline. Steps include: 1) Consultation & Design (5-7 days) - free consultation, mockup design, material recommendation; 2) Proofing - PDF proof & cylinder approval; 3) Manufacturing (20-30 days) - mass printing with quality checks; 4) Quality Control (3-5 days) - final inspection & testing; 5) Delivery (2-3 days) - shipping with certification docs. Green progress bar with checkmarks.
/imgs/infographic-our-process.webp.alt: Achieve Pack 5-step packaging manufacturing process infographic - consultation design proofing manufacturing quality control delivery with 30-45 day timeline

/imgs/infographic-composting-timeline.we.title: Industrial Composting Timeline for Compostable Packaging
/imgs/infographic-composting-timeline.we.description: Composting Timeline infographic showing biodegradation process in industrial composting facility at optimal temperature and moisture. Features ASTM D6400 / EN13432 certification badge. Timeline stages: Week 1 - pouch placed in compost bin with initial microbial activity; Month 1 - early breakdown with edges fragmenting; Month 2 - continued decomposition; Month 3 - partial decomposition with accelerated microbial action; Month 4-5 - advanced decomposition into organic fragments; Final - complete decomposition into nutrient-rich soil. Shows Achieve Pack branded pouch degrading with earthworms and organic matter.
/imgs/infographic-composting-timeline.we.alt: Compostable packaging industrial composting timeline showing 5-month biodegradation process from intact pouch to nutrient-rich soil with ASTM D6400 EN13432 certification

/imgs/coffee-pouch-nature-scene.webp.title: Kraft Coffee Pouch in Natural Forest Setting

/imgs/surface-finishes-showcase.webp.title: Premium Pouch Surface Finishes Collection

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/ap-logo.png.title: Achieve Pack Logo - Transparent Background
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/ap-logo.png.description: Official Achieve Pack 'ap' logo with integrated leaf design on transparent background. Green colored modern minimalist logo representing sustainable eco-friendly packaging brand. The leaf element symbolizes environmental commitment and natural materials.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/ap-logo.png.alt: Achieve Pack green ap logo with leaf design on transparent background - sustainable packaging brand identity

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/biope.png.title: I'm Green Bio-Polyethylene Logo
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/biope.png.description: Braskem 'I'm green' bio-polyethylene trademark logo on transparent background. Green text with integrated leaf design symbolizing plant-based sustainable plastic alternative. This certification mark indicates packaging made from sugarcane-based bio-PE, a renewable resource that reduces carbon footprint compared to fossil-based plastics.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/biope.png.alt: I'm Green Braskem bio-polyethylene logo - plant-based sustainable plastic certification mark with green leaf design

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/compost.png.title: Compostable Certification Seedling Logo
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/compost.png.description: Compostable certification trademark logo featuring green seedling/sprout design with registered trademark symbol. The iconic seedling represents biodegradable materials that break down into nutrient-rich compost. Used to indicate packaging certified to industrial or home composting standards like ASTM D6400, EN13432, or OK Compost.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/compost.png.alt: Compostable certification seedling logo - green sprout trademark symbol for biodegradable eco-friendly packaging materials

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/pcr.png.title: PCR Recycle Post-Consumer Recycled Logo
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/pcr.png.description: PCR RECYCLE certification logo featuring green leaf design indicating Post-Consumer Recycled content in packaging materials. This mark signifies that the product contains recycled plastic from consumer waste, reducing virgin plastic usage and supporting circular economy. Used for packaging with recycled PE, PP, or PET content.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/pcr.png.alt: PCR Recycle logo with green leaves - Post-Consumer Recycled content certification for sustainable packaging materials

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/recycle.png.title: PE and PP Plastic Recycling Symbols
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/recycle.png.description: Standard plastic recycling triangle symbols showing resin identification codes: #4 PE (Polyethylene) and #5 PP (Polypropylene). Green Mobius loop recycling arrows with numbers indicating recyclable plastic types. PE is commonly used for flexible packaging films while PP is used for rigid containers. Both are widely recyclable in most curbside programs.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/recycle.png.alt: PE 4 and PP 5 plastic recycling triangle symbols - polyethylene and polypropylene resin identification codes for recyclable packaging

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/why-us.png.title: Why Us - Achieve Pack Value Proposition Icon
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/why-us.png.description: 'WHY US' branding graphic with green leaf design representing Achieve Pack's unique value proposition and commitment to sustainability. Two-tone green leaves frame the text, symbolizing eco-friendly approach and natural materials. Used for marketing sections highlighting company advantages and differentiators.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/why-us.png.alt: Why Us green leaf icon - Achieve Pack sustainable packaging value proposition branding element

/imgs/cert-b.webp.title: Certified B Corporation Pending Badge
/imgs/cert-b.webp.description: Official Certified B Corporation Pending status logo on black background. /imgs/climate.webp.title: Climeworks Direct Air Capture CO2 Removal Technology
/imgs/climate.webp.description: Industrial Direct Air Capture (DAC) facility featuring Climeworks-style modular carbon capture collectors. Large cylindrical fan units with silver metallic housing arranged in stacked configuration, drawing atmospheric CO2. Set against lush green Swiss Alpine landscape with forested hills and traditional farmhouse. This cutting-edge climate technology removes carbon dioxide directly from ambient air for permanent storage or utilization, supporting carbon neutral and net-zero goals.
/imgs/climate.webp.alt: Climeworks Direct Air Capture facility with modular CO2 collectors in Swiss green landscape - industrial carbon removal technology for climate change mitigation

/imgs/brc-cert.webp.title: BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging Materials Certificate 2024
/imgs/brc-cert.webp.description: Official BRCGS (British Retail Consortium Global Standards) certificate for Global Standard for Packaging Materials Issue 6 August 2019. Achieved Grade B+ through Unannounced Audit Programme (1 in 3). Certificate issued by SGS United Kingdom Ltd with UKAS accreditation. Product Categories 5, 7. Auditor Number 33194. Evaluation Date 10 September 2024. Certificate Issue Date 14 October 2024. Valid until 01 December 2025. Covers gravure printing, digital printing, lamination, curing, slitting of flexible plastic film including BOPP, TOPP, POPP, PET, KPET, KOPP, VMCPP, VMPET, VMOPP, AL, BOPA, RCPP, CPP, PE-films for primary food contact. Authorized by Liz Moran, Business Manager. Features BRCGS Packaging Materials CERTIFICATED logo with purple branding.
/imgs/brc-cert.webp.alt: BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging Materials Grade B+ certificate 2024 - SGS UKAS accredited certification for food-safe flexible packaging production valid until December 2025

/imgs/comparison-flexible-vs-rigid.webp.title: The Data Doesn't Lie - Flexible vs Traditional Packaging Comparison
/imgs/comparison-flexible-vs-rigid.webp.description: 'THE DATA DOESN'T LIE' infographic comparing traditional packaging versus Achieve Pack flexible solutions across three key environmental metrics. PLASTIC USAGE: Traditional plastic bottle and pouch at 100% vs Achieve Pack solution at 30% = 70% LESS PLASTIC. CARBON FOOTPRINT: Traditional factory emissions at 100% vs Achieve Pack eco-friendly production at 30% = 70% LOWER CO2. STORAGE EFFICIENCY: Traditional warehouse storage at 100% vs Achieve Pack compact pouches at 30% = 70% SPACE SAVINGS. Visual bar charts with red X marks on traditional and green checkmarks on Achieve Pack solutions. Features Achieve Pack 'ap' logo with tagline.
/imgs/comparison-flexible-vs-rigid.webp.alt: The Data Doesn't Lie infographic - Achieve Pack flexible packaging vs traditional showing 70% less plastic, 70% lower CO2, 70% space savings comparison

/imgs/feature-barrier-options.webp.title: 8 Eco-Friendly Barrier Options - Low Medium High Maximum Protection
/imgs/feature-barrier-options.webp.description: Comprehensive display of 8 eco-friendly packaging barrier options ranging from Low to Maximum protection levels. Options include: 1) Low Barrier (No Window) - minimal protection, breathable with gray O2/moisture/light indicators; 2) Medium Transparent Barrier (Optional Window) - moderate protection, visible with yellow indicators; 3) Metallized High Barrier (No Window) - high protection, foil-lined with orange indicators; 4) Aluminum Maximum Barrier (No Window) - total protection, complete block with red indicators; 5) Kraft Low Barrier (No Window) - basic protection, natural feel; 6) Kraft Medium Barrier (Optional Window) - standard protection, windowed; 7) Kraft High Barrier (No Window) - enhanced protection, durable; 8) Kraft Maximum Barrier (No Window) - superior protection, robust. Visual data points legend: Grey=Low, Yellow=Medium, Orange=High, Red=Maximum, Green=Recyclable.
/imgs/feature-barrier-options.webp.alt: 8 Eco-Friendly Barrier Options showing low medium high maximum protection levels - transparent metallized aluminum and kraft sustainable pouch barriers

/imgs/feature-pouch-shapes.webp.title: 7+ Pouch Configurations - Any Size Any Closure
/imgs/feature-pouch-shapes.webp.description: Comprehensive display of 7+ sustainable pouch configurations with Achieve Pack branding. Options include: 3-Side Seal Pouch, Stand-Up Pouch, Box Pouch, Flat-Bottom Pouch, Quad Seal Pouch, Side Gusset Pouch, and Spout Pouch. Available from XXXS to XXL sizes with Zipper, Spout, and Tin-Tie closure options. Custom printing available with MOQ 100 pcs. Kraft and olive green color variations shown.
/imgs/feature-pouch-shapes.webp.alt: 7 pouch configurations from Achieve Pack - 3-side seal stand-up box flat-bottom quad seal side gusset spout pouches in various sizes with zipper spout tin-tie closures

/imgs/feature-printing-finishes.webp.title: Premium Sustainable Printing Finishes Collection
/imgs/feature-printing-finishes.webp.description: Showcase of 6 premium sustainable printing finishes on stand-up pouches with Achieve Pack 'ap' branding. Options include: MATTE FINISH (dark green, Premium Sustainable Finishes), GLOSS FINISH (silver metallic, Premium Sustainable Finishes), SOFT-TOUCH FINISH (beige/champagne, Luxury You Can Feel with brush texture demo), METALLIC FINISH (gold, Premium Sustainable Finishes), EMBOSSED POUCH (dark teal with geometric pattern, Premium Sustainable Finishes), STAMP FOIL FINISH (navy blue, Luxury You Can Feel). All finishes available on eco-friendly packaging.
/imgs/feature-printing-finishes.webp.alt: 6 premium pouch printing finishes - matte gloss soft-touch metallic embossed stamp foil sustainable packaging options from Achieve Pack

/imgs/feature-reclosure-solutions.webp.title: Reclosure Options for Freshness Convenience Reusability
/imgs/feature-reclosure-solutions.webp.description: Comprehensive infographic showing 5 reclosure options for sustainable packaging. Features: ZIPPER CLOSURE (e.g., stand-up pouch) - Press & Slide to seal, Pull to open; TIN-TIE CLOSURE (e.g., coffee/snack bag) - Fold over, Bend ties, Secure; SPOUT CAP (e.g., liquid pouch) - Twist to seal, Untwist to dispense; PRESS-TO-CLOSE CLOSURE (e.g., modern pressure seal) - Apply pressure to engage seal with Achieve Pack branding; VALVE (optional, e.g., coffee pouch) - Allows gas out, keeps air out. Icons show Freshness, Convenience, and Reusability benefits.
/imgs/feature-reclosure-solutions.webp.alt: 5 pouch reclosure options - zipper tin-tie spout cap press-to-close valve closures for freshness convenience reusability in sustainable packaging

/imgs/infographic-carbon-footprint.webp.title: 70% Carbon Footprint Reduction Infographic
/imgs/infographic-carbon-footprint.webp.description: Environmental impact comparison infographic showing 70% CARBON FOOTPRINT REDUCTION. Left side: Traditional Plastic Production with factory emitting dark CO2 smoke clouds. Right side: Sustainable Achieve Pack solution with green eco-friendly pouch surrounded by leaves and minimal CO2 emissions with green checkmark. Large '70% REDUCTION' text with downward arrow. Based on comparative lifecycle assessment data. Features Achieve Pack 'ap' logo.
/imgs/infographic-carbon-footprint.webp.alt: 70% carbon footprint reduction infographic comparing traditional plastic factory emissions vs sustainable Achieve Pack eco-friendly packaging

/imgs/infographic-fast-turnaround.webp.title: Fast Turnaround Times - 6-8 Weeks vs 12-16 Weeks
/imgs/infographic-fast-turnaround.webp.description: FAST TURNAROUND TIMES infographic comparing Achieve Pack digital printing speed vs traditional suppliers. Production timeline: Design (2-3 WEEKS) → Sample → Approval → Production (6-8 WEEKS) → Delivery. Traditional suppliers shown as slow snail taking 12-16 weeks. Achieve Pack shown as fast rocket taking only 6-8 weeks. MEET YOUR TIMELINE tagline emphasizes digital printing enables faster production. Features stopwatch icon and Achieve Pack 'ap' logo.
/imgs/infographic-fast-turnaround.webp.alt: Fast turnaround times infographic - Achieve Pack 6-8 weeks vs traditional suppliers 12-16 weeks with digital printing for faster production

/imgs/infographic-grs-recyclable.webp.title: GRS-Certified Recyclable Options - Complete Circular Economy
/imgs/infographic-grs-recyclable.webp.description: GRS-CERTIFIED RECYCLABLE OPTIONS infographic showing complete circular economy flow. Process: Used packaging → Collection bin → Recycling facility → New material → New packaging (with 100% Recycled Content Post-Consumer Recycled PCR badge). Center features GLOBAL RECYCLE STANDARD (GRS) logo with COMPLETE CIRCULAR ECONOMY text. Bottom shows benefits: Waste Reduction, Material Tracking, Certified Recycling Process, Chain of Custody & Traceability. Third-party certified for circular economy integration. Features Achieve Pack 'ap' logo.
/imgs/infographic-grs-recyclable.webp.alt: GRS Global Recycle Standard certified recyclable packaging infographic showing complete circular economy with waste reduction material tracking traceability

/imgs/infographic-low-moq.webp.title: Low Minimum Order 100 Pieces - Start Small Test Faster

/imgs/infographic-plant-based.webp.title: Plant-Based Renewable Materials - Reduces Fossil Fuel Dependence
/imgs/infographic-plant-based.webp.description: PLANT-BASED RENEWABLE MATERIALS infographic showing sustainable material sourcing. Top section: Corn and sugarcane plants absorbing CO2 from atmosphere, converting to kraft eco-pouch in RENEWABLE LOOP cycle with green checkmark. Bottom comparison: Fossil Fuels (black oil barrel) VS Renewable Plants (corn and sugarcane). REDUCES FOSSIL FUEL DEPENDENCE tagline. Made from cornstarch PLA and sugarcane bagasse. /imgs/infographic-plant-based.webp.alt: Plant-based renewable materials infographic showing corn sugarcane CO2 absorption renewable loop vs fossil fuels - cornstarch PLA sugarcane bagasse sustainable packaging

/imgs/infographic-premium-finishes.webp.title: Premium Finishes at Lower Cost - Digital Printing Advantage
/imgs/infographic-premium-finishes.webp.description: PREMIUM FINISHES AT LOWER COST infographic showcasing 6 premium pouch finish options with budget-friendly pricing. Top row displays: Matte finish (kraft with PREMIUM QUALITY badge), Glossy finish (gold), Metallic/holographic finish (rainbow iridescent), Spot UV finish (kraft), and Soft-touch coating (kraft). All with green checkmarks. Center: BUDGET-FRIENDLY PRICE with dollar sign and upward arrow. Bottom comparison: Traditional Printing (press machine with $$$ high setup costs) vs Digital Printing (inkjet printer with affordable premium options). PROFESSIONAL LOOK, BUDGET-FRIENDLY PRICE tagline. Digital printing reduces setup costs for premium finishes. Features Achieve Pack 'ap' logo.

/imgs/infographic-shipping-storage.webp.title: Shipping Cost Savings & Storage Space Savings Infographic
/imgs/infographic-shipping-storage.webp.description: Two-part infographic showing logistics benefits. TOP: SHIPPING COST SAVINGS - 15-22% LESS SHIPPING COSTS comparing Traditional Packaging (heavy cardboard box with shipping weight icon) to Achieve Pack Pouches (organized flat pouches in shipping box with dollar savings). Arrow shows cost reduction. BOTTOM: STORAGE SPACE SAVINGS - 70% SPACE SAVINGS comparing Cluttered Shelf (rigid containers with disorganized warehouse) to Organized Shelf (efficient pouches on neat warehouse shelving). Percentage arrow shows space optimization. Features Achieve Pack 'ap' logo.
/imgs/infographic-shipping-storage.webp.alt: Shipping and storage savings infographic - 15-22% less shipping costs and 70% space savings comparing traditional rigid packaging vs efficient Achieve Pack pouches

/imgs/landing-hero.png.title: Eco Pouch - Plant-Based Compostable Eco-Friendly Packaging
/imgs/landing-hero.png.description: Hero product image of kraft brown eco pouch stand-up bag with green leaf branding. Features 'eco pouch' text with tagline 'no plastic | no wastage | no problem'. Bottom label states 'PLANT-BASED. COMPOSTABLE. ECO-FRIENDLY.' Premium sustainable packaging from Achieve Pack showcased on dark background for maximum visual impact.
/imgs/landing-hero.png.alt: Eco Pouch kraft stand-up bag with no plastic no wastage no problem tagline - plant-based compostable eco-friendly sustainable packaging from Achieve Pack

/imgs/pcr-grs-cert-1.webp.title: SGS Global Recycled Standard GRS Certificate with PCR Certification
/imgs/pcr-grs-cert-1.webp.description: Official SGS Scope Certificate for Global Recycled Standard (Version 4.0). Certificate Number SGC-GRC50841-GRS-2023-12. Product categories: Packaging (PC0023), Manufacturing (PR0016), Packing (PR0020), Printing (PR0023). Valid until 2025-01-02. Audit criteria: Global Recycled Standard V4.0, Content Claim Standard V3.1, Textile Exchange Standards Claims Policy V1.3. Certified by SGS with Textile Exchange licensing. Features PCR RECYCLE logo badge (Post Consumer Recycled Packaging Material in green) and Global Recycled Standard circular logo.
/imgs/pcr-grs-cert-1.webp.alt: SGS Global Recycled Standard GRS scope certificate with PCR Post Consumer Recycled certification - sustainable packaging material verification

/imgs/process-5-steps.webp.title: Our Process - 5 Steps to Custom Packaging in 30-45 Days
/imgs/process-5-steps.webp.description: OUR PROCESS infographic showing 5-step custom packaging production workflow with Achieve Pack branding. Steps: 1) Consultation & Design (5-7 days) - Free consultation, Mockup design, Material recommendation; 2) Proofing - PDF proof & cylinder approval; 3) Manufacturing (20-30 days) - Mass printing with quality checks; 4) Quality Control (3-5 days) - Final inspection & testing; 5) Delivery (2-3 days) - Shipping with certification docs. Green progress bar with checkmarks at each stage. 30-45 Day Total Timeline highlighted at bottom.
/imgs/process-5-steps.webp.alt: Achieve Pack 5-step packaging process infographic - consultation proofing manufacturing quality control delivery with 30-45 day total timeline

/imgs/product-composting-timeline.webp.title: Composting Timeline - Industrial Composting Process
/imgs/product-composting-timeline.webp.description: COMPOSTING TIMELINE infographic showing biodegradation process in industrial composting facility at optimal temperature and moisture. Features EN13432/ASTM D6400 CERTIFIED badge. Timeline: WEEK 1 - Compostable pouch with Achieve Pack branding placed in compost bin surrounded by organic matter (food scraps, leaves), initial microbial activity begins. MONTH 1 - Early breakdown, pouch edges fragmenting, microorganisms colonizing. MONTH 2 - Complete decomposition, fully integrated into compost. MONTH 3 - Partial decomposition, significantly degraded, accelerated microbial action. MONTH 4-5 - Advanced decomposition, mostly broken into organic fragments, integrated into developing humus. Rich dark soil with earthworms shown as final result, ready for nutrient-rich soil application.
/imgs/product-composting-timeline.webp.alt: Composting timeline infographic showing 5-month biodegradation from compostable pouch to nutrient-rich soil with EN13432 ASTM D6400 certification

/imgs/product-pcr-biobased.webp.title: PCR & Bio-Based Materials - Sustainable Pouch Collection
/imgs/product-pcr-biobased.webp.description: PCR & Bio-Based Materials product showcase featuring diverse sustainable pouch collection on natural backdrop with soybeans and kraft paper. Display includes: matte gray pouches with Achieve Pack 'ap' logo, olive green pouches, cream/white pouches, silver metallic pouches. Central recycling symbol emphasizes circular economy. FDA FOOD CONTACT APPROVED badge on kraft tag. Various sizes and configurations shown including stand-up pouches with zipper closures. Natural botanical elements (dried flowers, soybeans) complement eco-friendly theme.
/imgs/product-pcr-biobased.webp.alt: PCR and Bio-Based Materials sustainable pouch collection with FDA approved kraft olive gray silver pouches featuring recycling symbol and Achieve Pack branding

/imgs/product-recyclable-pouches.webp.title: Mono-Material Recyclable Pouches - GRS Certified
/imgs/product-recyclable-pouches.webp.description: Mono-Material Recyclable pouches lifestyle photography showing three sustainable packaging options on marble surface. Left: white matte stand-up pouch with Achieve Pack 'ap' logo. Center: cream/white pouch with Achieve Pack branding. Right: kraft brown pouch with GRS CERTIFIED recycling badge being held by hand. 'Mono-Material Recyclable' text overlay emphasizes single-material construction for easier recycling. Clean, modern aesthetic demonstrates premium sustainable packaging solution.
/imgs/product-recyclable-pouches.webp.alt: Mono-Material Recyclable pouches with GRS Certified kraft bag - white and cream sustainable stand-up pouches on marble surface

/imgs/solution-cosmetics.webp.title: Premium Sustainable Finishes for Cosmetics Packaging
/imgs/solution-cosmetics.webp.description: Grid showcase of 6 premium sustainable finishes for cosmetics and beauty packaging. MATTE FINISH (dark green, Premium Sustainable Finishes badge), GLOSS FINISH (silver metallic with 'ap' logo), SOFT-TOUCH FINISH (beige/champagne, Premium Sustainable Finishes badge, with makeup brush), METALLIC FINISH (gold, Luxury You Can Feel), EMBOSSED POUCH (navy blue with geometric pattern, Premium Sustainable Finishes), SPOT UV FINISH (black with glossy 'ap' logo, Luxury You Can Feel). All pouches feature stand-up design with zipper closure for cosmetics industry.
/imgs/solution-cosmetics.webp.alt: 6 premium cosmetics packaging finishes - matte gloss soft-touch metallic embossed spot UV sustainable pouches for beauty products
